p: The density of A. trifida was significantly higher than that of the other species in all habitats, reaching 1.35–4.4 times that of the companion species in the FR period. The density of A. artemisiifolia was higher than that of the companion species in the farmland ecotone, residential area, and roadside, at 1.39–2.23 times that of the companion species in FR period. However, the density of A. artemisiifolia was lower than that of the companion species in grassland, at only 0.37 times the density of the companion species in FR period (Figure 4).
